name: Wander Island
description:
Controls :

Z / Left Click - Attack

I  - Hide / Show Inventory

X - Interact (Signboards, NPCs, Chests, Papers, Ladders, etc)

WASD / Arrow Keys - Player Movement

Inventory Controls :

Left Click - Equip / Use an Item

Right Click - Show an Item's Description

Dialogue Controls :

X - Progress Dialogue

Left Click - Choose a Dialogue Option

Information :

1. The game pauses while on background

2. Has an auto-save feature (every x seconds)

Credits :

Maps - Created by my co-workers.

Tilesets - Open Game Art 2D

Player & NPC Sprites - Sprite Creator 3 VX

Monster Sprites - Ragnarok Online

Item Sprites - Ragnarok Online & Fire Emblem
